alert.note: Alert for Liberty; Long; McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 08 at 8:08PM EDT until August 08 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BRYAN...LIBERTY...MCINTOSH...CHATHAM AND LONG COUNTIES... At 807 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Halfmoon Landing, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Darien, Tibet, Jones, McIntosh, Midway, Riceboro, Flemington, Harris Neck, Eulonia, Valona, South Newport, Sunbury, Belfast, Halfmoon Landing, and Retreat. This warning includes I-95 in Georgia between mile markers 50 and 84. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
